name: Crazy Circuit Drive Loop Car - Cartoon Crash Taxi
name_original: Crazy Circuit Drive Loop Car - Cartoon Crash Taxi
description:
Crazy Circuit Drive Loop Car is a speed car racing game. Play like a brave and hard driver. Do the stunts with your car by increasing the speed to get points. Be careful while moving through roads, crashing into other cars, overtaking civilian trucks will hurt!

Feel your dreams in this fast, and action packed multi cars racing games. With this fast speed racing game you have to perform like a real driver by passing through furious traffic roads. Look around in the fastest cars on three different loop roads. Each one is more difficult than before and there are many different environments to enhance your driving experience.

You never dare car race so fast in this real world. Your jeep rides with amazing speed during traffic rush! Simple click on right side of device to boost turbo, to speed up your car and left half of the screen to break.


Game Features:
- Smooth Controls with intuitive performance.
- One button for race and one for break.
- An Exciting experience to drive through traffic cars.
- Brilliant HD Graphics for maximum entertainment.
